title: A Soap For Guys: The Final 'Sons of Anarchy' Season
teaser: FX’s hugely popular drama “Sons of Anarchy” starts its final season tonight.
contentencoded:
Tonight FX’s hugely popular drama “Sons of Anarchy” starts its final season.

NPR’s TV critic Eric Deggans talks to Here & Now’s Robin Young about why the show commands such a big audience, and why it decided to call it quits after its seventh season.

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, NPR TV critic. He tweets @Deggans.
Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
